summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 8%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 836 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 660.1m higher than yesterday, 237.5m lower than the past week, 835.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1925.8m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Chance of light rain, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
